text:
The Market created under the provisions of the preceding Section shall be known as the Flea Market. Its maintenance and operation shall be financed by fees charged to vendors who utilize the facilities of the Market and by such other funds as may be appropriated therefor in accordance with the budgetary procedure of the Charter. 
(Added by Ord. 287-98, App. 9/18/98)

heading.title: 9B
heading.catch_text: HOW KNOWN; FINANCES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATION.
